entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS THIS MORNING
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
